articles.title: Women who survive cancer are more likely than men to have fatigue and depression - NBC News
articles.description: Women who survive cancer are more likely to experience cancer-related fatigue and depression than men, according to new research presented Tuesday at the American Association for Cancer Research’s annual meeting in Chicago.
